content:
Play after making two successful consecutive melee Strikes against the same target with two different weapons.

The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} until the bleeding stops. If you are 7th level or higher, increase the bleed to [[/r {2d6}[persistent,bleed]]]. If you are 12th level or higher, increase the bleed to [[/r {3d6}[persistent,bleed]]].
name: Rending Swipe
